reviewText: I have only watched the first two.  They are 1940's railroad promos to get one to ride the train.  Definitely not what I thought I was getting.
I have twin grandsons that are really "into" steam engines and trains.  They are mesmerized by the scenes depicted on these six disks and want to watch them over and over.  Almost replaced Star Wars!
I enjoy railroad videos and this one seems very complete. I enjoyed the old Public Relations videos, produced by the various railroads. Dvd quality was quite good too.
My dad is an avid train fanatic, and is really hard to buy for, but I can never go wrong with these DVD sets. I bought him a different one for his birthday and he loved it.
